5 Strategy What sustainability means to us 
To achieve these objectives, Aegon needs a strong foundation, which means: 
• Being transparent and accountable in setting clear goals and reporting. 
• Meeting recognized international standards with regard to sustainability. 
• Being a good and responsible “steward” of all the company’s resources.
